name: Miniature PlayStation Sound Format File
summary: Learn about .MINIPSF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Nullsoft Winamp with the Highly Experimental plugin

description: Audio file similar to a .PSF (Portable Sound File) file; contains imported sequence data for songs from .PSFLIB files located in the same directory; must be able to access driver code and sound banks from PSFLIB files in order to work; can be zlib compressed to save space and increase efficiency; commonly used by Sony PlayStation, a video game console.
